website_summaries.verdict: A basic model with mid-level speed that's attractive and easy to ride – but it isn't the most reliable or comfortable one we considered.
pros: This bike offers 3 speeds, which makes it the ideal cruiser for men that need a bike that isn't too laid back but also aren't looking for much speed
cons: Has some quality issues, including tires that go flat, bearings that come loose, and pedals that break

customer_reviews.title: Beach Cruiser plus 49cc engine kit is great!
customer_reviews.text: Well made single-speed beach cruiser - arrived in perfect condition, easy to put together, excellent finish. I'm 5'11" 225 pounds and this is a comfortable cruiser and a wonderful flat olive green color. I bought it from Amazon for under $200 delivered to my home and couldn't be happier. When I assembled it, I also mounted a 49cc 4-cycle engine kit from bikeberry.com and I LOVE commuting around 16 miles a day between my home and studio. LOTS of attention from drivers on the road who generally shoot me a thumbs up and want to know where the HECK did I get this super-cool motor bike! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Great beach cruiser bike.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a comfortable bike to ride around the neighborhood with my wife and son, and this bike is perfect for that. I got the 3 speed because we have hills and my wife has a 21 speed that i wanted to try to keep up with. I'm glad to say this bike handles both perfectly, and i feel like I'm riding I style. I got the matching fenders, and will probably get the toddler seat to go with it so i can take my 3 year old bike rides with me.
customer_reviews.author: Growler42

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart Easily
customer_reviews.text: We have had to rebuild this bike multiple times over the course of owning it. The seat comes loose very easily, and no matter how tight you screw in the bolt, it will come loose in a matter of days if not sooner. The seat itself is unimpressive and hard. The bike looks european and has a retro aesthetic, but it is absolutely not worth the hassle. I never feel safe riding it, and always worry that one small bump going down a hill will be enough to break something else, as it feels fragile overall.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend, stylish, comfortable, and Quality procduct!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to assemble don't be afraid to try yourself. Install front tire, install handle bar into head tube, connect front brake cable, install seat and seat post, install pedals. Need two allen wrenches sizes, 5/8", 9/16" (metrics are called). 15-20 minutes assembly... and another 20-30 minutes test riding and making minor adjustments... literally within thirty minutes I was test fitting and riding the bike... 7 speed is perfect for the hills in my neighborhood. Manufacturer has done a wonderful job with this product! I love the look, feel and quality! I believe its high quality for the price... Extremely comfortable ride and very stylish in matte grey color. Skip the Craigslist search or the store visit.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan T Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Great Cruiser
customer_reviews.text: Bike showed up packaged nicely and went together easily. I did notice the headset was a bit stiff so I pulled it apart and the bearings where pretty dry. I lubed the bearings up with Royal Purple grease and put everything back together. The bike works great and is much lighter than I thought it would be. The seat it comes with is also very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Braddah

customer_reviews.title: Shiny, comfy, cruiser
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously a badass cruiser. I bought the chrome 26" single speed. I'm 6'1" and 240lbs. Rides comfortably and has enough adjustments to suit my size. Reside in CA so received 2 days after purchasing (company in SoCal). Rides smooth, everything went together in about 90 minutes, 60 of which included the removal of those hideous stickers and glue (worst part of assembly was getting glue off!). Shiny, comfy, cruiser...what more is there to say?! Will update if anything changes but this is our second Firmstrong bike and the other is 6 years old and still cruising.
customer_reviews.author: MrD

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: I got the 10 speed version in red. Good looking bike, comfortable, easy to ride and shift gears. Quality materials used. Thank goodness for the Schrader valves. Easy assembly. Reasonably priced. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Fizzie

customer_reviews.title: Buyers Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: The bike itself feels and looks great. My issue is not with the bike but with the company I bought the bike from. Buy directly from amazon or firmstrong if you can. DO NOT BUY FROM BRIDGE RESOURCES! A bike that normally costs $300 they upcharge by $400. I spent $729 on a bike actually worth much less. I know it was my own mistake but that is absurd!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bike! Easy to assemble, comfortable to ride and gets tons of compliments. I'm 6 foot tall and 245 lbs and this bike is a perfect fit for me. Definately recommend. I've had it several months, use it 4 to 5 times a week for several miles at a time, and no squeeks, or problems at all (knock on wood!).
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: Performs Well and Comfortable on long Rides
customer_reviews.text: I am not what you would call handy, but I was able to assemble the bike in about 45 minutes. I ride on and off-road quite a bit, so I've put > 200 miles before I blew a tire. I was able to change the tube quickly with the simple kit I bring along in about 1/2 an hour. This is a starter bike for me, and I'm learning all I can from working on it and maintaining it. I clean and lube the chain and gears, tune the spokes, and aside from the one flat tire, it's been a great bike for me.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great starter Bike.
customer_reviews.text: I have this bike for almost 2 months. Built us very strong and sturdy. Not the best of comforts but it does the job. Assembly took some time but not a rocket science. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Lokesh Mohan

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike. Instructions could improve.
customer_reviews.text: The bike is great. The assembly instructions could be improved. The pictures are very limited. If you buy the fenders it is very complicated because there are not any instructions included with those. It is a lot of guess work and trial and error. Assembly of the bike took me about an hour. Figuring out how to add the fenders was an additional hour and having to phone a friend to help.
customer_reviews.author: terrah

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike for the price. Assembly was easy. Comfortable ride. Did arrive with a few minor scratches look to have happened at factory they were under the packing. I did add the matching fenders great retro look. Shipped quickly. Made a few changes to get that old retro look. Love this bike glad i bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Cunha

customer_reviews.title: 7 Speed Beach Cruiser
customer_reviews.text: After owning bike for about a month and taking numerous rides, I can say that it met all of my expectations. Assembly took about an hour but I was in no hurry. I am exactly 6ft and weigh 185 and bike fits me well. The seven speed shifts well and ride is smooth. Fit and finish looks great and I have received a few comments on how good the bike looks. Hoping the bike gives me years of service. I got it mostly for cardio rides as my gym shut down due to pandemic 😲
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Assembled in 10 Minutes
customer_reviews.text: The best 7 speed I have ever owned, and got it, despite the run on bikes presently. BUT I still like my electric bike, as I don't do hills well.
customer_reviews.author: JustBill

customer_reviews.title: This cruiser is awesome. We rode everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike after a visit to Venice beach where I rented a beach cruiser, and wanted buy one for other trips. Took the Firmstrong Urban to Austin ACL and used it the entire time. This cruiser is awesome. We rode everywhere, Ann Hike and Bike trail to after shows, zilker park, and dinner spots. Its really a relaxing way to enjoy any bike friendly city. I used a mountain bike before and was hunched over the whole time. I really enjoy riding more upright to enjoy the atmosphere and take in scenery. The 7-speed is a must in Austin, maybe not in Houston.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High probablitiy will need adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Over all, this is a good bike. However, take note that there is a high possibility it will need adjustments. Most noticeable is wheel alignment and axil. I bought a male and female bike of the same brand, both three speeds and both 26 inches. Both bikes front wheels had a noticeable wobble. Her bike needed a spoke adjustment. My bike, the front wheel axil was not tight against the bearings with at least an 1/8 inch of horizontal slop. Both were SO unacceptable from wobble that I had to take the front wheels to a bike shop for adjustments. $$$ later, I'm happy with them now. As I said, good bike - but buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great bike and value.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bike for those of us who need a little exercise. I had no problem with assembling the bike. And riding it was as joyous as I remembered it when I was a kid. If you're not going off road then I recommend you take a closer look at this bike. And excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Steam Maker

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike. Easy to assemble. Clear, easy to read instructions. Smooth, easy shifting and stops on a dime. This is the best deal you will find for a quality, well built bike. Good job Firmstrong!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kraz

customer_reviews.title: Stong Comfortable but Heavy and rust prone in spots
customer_reviews.text: Strong bike, comfortable but heavy avoid the chrome fenders they rusted very easily got all iver the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Great price and comfortable ride
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my significant other and he loves it. Comfortable for our rides on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with minor damage.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 5 star rating, however the left handle grip was torn and dented on arrival. Otherwise, my husband LOVES the bike. I would like to note that I purchased the women's urban single speed beach cruiser and it arrived in perfect condition and I LOVE IT! So, for the price, this is an awesome bike!
customer_reviews.author: Rajni Anala

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike, but potential problems if you build it yourself.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bike, but mine is having some problems out of the box with the chain/front gear setup. Still troubleshooting, but it might have gotten bent in transit - It skips cogs and catches the chain in some places. I opted out of the third party assembly, so maybe they would have fixed it if I had used that.
customer_reviews.author: Lawliet

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BIKE!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this bike for my husband....I also ordered myself one in Vanilla. We then added the fenders seperately. These bikes are gorgeous. We have ridden them extensively around town and to the beach. They are solidly made, ride great, The assembly was easy. And the vendor-BEACH BIKES- are awesome. They emailed us with contact info and helpful advice immediately after purchase. We did send them an email to tell them that we did not have an allen wrench to put together the bike and had to go buy one. They immediately wrote back asking us to send them the bill so that they could reimburse us. GREAT company. GREAT bike.
customer_reviews.author: Tina H.

customer_reviews.title: Great bike at this price point
customer_reviews.text: Great bike at this price point. Im roughly 240 6' tall and this bike holds my weight well. Well packaged, and assembly took 15 minutes. Basically, youll need a metric allen key and a wrench or socket. Put the front wheel on, attach the stem and handlebars, attach the seat and post, and inflate the tires and you are ready to ride. I liked how the reflectors are included separately for those of us who choose not to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Odin

customer_reviews.title: Great bike. Good price. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Sturdy bike. Wanted some gears for additional use beyond a beach cruiser. Purchased for a birthday present. Husband loves it! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cv

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BIKE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my new Urban Man cruiser....this bike rides so smooth and comfortable. It feels like i'm riding a two-wheeled cadilac! I ordered the chrome fenders to go with it and they make the bike look awesome! The gear ratio on this cruiser makes pedaling a breeze, and it easily goes up grades like they weren't even there! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz65

customer_reviews.title: Best bike I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best bike I ever had. I am tall. 1.89m (6'20'') and this bike looks It was done for me. Ride position amazing and I get a baby seat for my son, I tried this seat on a mountain bike and it was uncomfortable, in this bike it is perfect to ride with the baby in. Anyways, if you look for a beautiful and very comfortable bike your search may be over.
customer_reviews.author: bruno de jesus villas boas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bike.
customer_reviews.text: The bike was very easy to put together. I was surprised by the quality and finish for a bike at this price point. Overall I’m very happy with it. My only complaint was I had to do a lot of adjustments to brakes, shifter, and wheels to get it all working smoothly. However that is just part of the deal when buying a bike online vs a bike store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's kinda cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking bike but it's pretty obvious that it's cheaply built. Too bad, cuz it's really cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: wwambach

customer_reviews.title: Serious issue costting me more money
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this bicycle because of all the good reviews. Once I got it together though I found that both tires were bent so bad it was unrideable. I am currently waiting for local shop to repair it, should of just bought it there in first place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product-big hassle with anazon
customer_reviews.text: All great except front wheel not round and true so it wobbles side to side and requires replacement. A big hassle with Amazon to get the wheel simply replaced! They offered to send complete new bike;that requires assembly all over again which is not very helpful. I just need a new front wheel to swap out.
customer_reviews.author: Jan kreminski

customer_reviews.title: Perfection! 100% Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: The bike rides so smoothly and was super easy to put together. My boyfriend and I bought these for each other for Christmas and we're obsessed! They're perfect for the beach area where we live! Also, the Beach Bikes team is amazing! Customer Service was world class and completely personal, and they were there to answer questions every step of the way. I even got a handwritten letter asking how we liked the bikes and giving us company background. 100% recommend doing business with Beach Bikes!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: THE ASSEMBLE AND THE BREAK
customer_reviews.text: I was worry how I will assemble this bicycle because the company is too far from me but when I received it its already 90% assembled just I have to assemble front wheel. the set and steering its amazing bicycle to use the break just reverse your feet it will stop smoothly and easly thanks for great packing because its really long trip more than 1 week from USA until QATAR THANKS FOR A GREAT JOB.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I must purchase
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my bike it's a really well-built bike I'm a 250lb man and it feels very safe and secure... I highly recommend this bike..
customer_reviews.author: James ross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bike
customer_reviews.text: This was is a strong and satisfying bike. I love going on bike rides around my neighborhood on it. The bike rides very smooth and handles beautifully. And finally, it fits my hipster style very well. Thank you Firmstrong!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Shimko

customer_reviews.title: Firmstrong....Made in China!
customer_reviews.text: The Bike came with 2 bent rims..... Cant even adjust brakes with out it it rubbing. Very disappointed. I will have to take it to a bike shop and spend more money to have it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery A. Hofmeister

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: Everything about it is absolutely awesome. But I’m pretty skinny and when I sit on the sink it’s really not that comfortable at least for me. But the presentation is absolutely awesome and it’s easy to assemble but I did have a little trouble with the handlebars but that was pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike, but the front wheel wasnt true when I received it, so I had to adjust the spokes to put it in alignment. Other than that its great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cagle

customer_reviews.title: comfortable nice riding bike
customer_reviews.text: comfortable nice riding bike.easy to assemble, great lookin bike, love my bicycle
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey G. Williams

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this bike only to find out the front forks were bent! Poor quality control by the company to allow something like this to ship. What a waste of time! Nice looking bike but packed it back up and sent it back. Guess you get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tire issues
customer_reviews.text: Wheel spokes unevenly tight (“improper trued wheels”). Only visible once it’s mounted and results in reduced lifecycle and issues with braking.
customer_reviews.author: Whatever

customer_reviews.title: Best comfort bike!
customer_reviews.text: The bike met or exceeded my many expectations of comfort, quality, great looking and easy to assemble! I would recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable ride!
customer_reviews.author: JVMAST

customer_reviews.title: good bike except for optional fender mount holes
customer_reviews.text: very good looking, comfortable ride, pretty easy to assemble. My only complaint is with the drill holes for mounting the optional fenders would not take the provided screws. I tried to improvise using smaller gauge screw but it's still a pain. I am going to remove them completely, so still a good bike but don't waste your money on the fenders.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great bike from a really cool company
customer_reviews.text: Love the Firmstrong bike - comfortable, sturdy, safe. It looks good and is a perfect cruiser. It isn't light, so I don't plan on putting it on a roof rack, but I didn't buy it for its weight. Great value for the price. Beachbikes gave really great service. I ordered the bike on a Wednesday night at about 11pm, and the bike was delivered, for standard shipping charges, on the Friday afternoon. OK - I'm only 80 miles from them, but that's still great service. The assembly instructions were clear and easy to follow with a few tools, and I was ready to go under an hour, and I was going slow. Just all around cool!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Scott

customer_reviews.title: I love this bike.
customer_reviews.text: It's a real nice bike other then the ball retainer being damaged in the steering assembly when I got the bike. Other then that I love the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbyjospain

customer_reviews.title: Great simple 3-speed cruiser
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exact bike one year ago. It had been a long time since I fooled around with a bike. I assembled it very quickly...there was not much to do actually. Any klutz can do what is required. I love its simplicity, easy shifting within the 3 speeds, which makes a huge difference even in the relatively flat terrain of central Florida. It is well made, and a beautiful piece of retro-art with functionality. I recommend this bike highly.
customer_reviews.author: trh

customer_reviews.title: Rides well, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Need a little bit bigger seat but otherwise awesome. Get the 3 speed, it helps with getting up hills. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: LittleDealsBigDeals

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bike
customer_reviews.text: This bike arrived ahead of it's scheduled date and in good condition. The assembly instructions were included and easy to follow. The paint is beautiful and the bike is well made and will last a long time. I use this bike for little neighborhood jaunts and it is smooth and fun to ride. If you want a single speed, balloon tire bike, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: great , high quality bike, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Customer service sent replacement parts to me so that I was able to have a happy bike.
customer_reviews.author: G.Gause

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and looks cool! Love this bike! Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good bike
customer_reviews.text: I received it much faster than expected and it was easy to put together and rides very well. This would have been 5 Stars except for the following: The fenders where shipped in a separate box and I had to put them on myself. No big deal for the front one but the back one would have required removing the rear wheel in order to have clearance to install the screw. To avoid this I got "creative" and used a smaller screw and nut from the opposite side. This was a hassle to do but was much easier than removing the rear tire would have been.. Still it is a great bike and I am enjoying riding it daily.
customer_reviews.author: MCS

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: this bike is sweet. i love the look and way it rides. it came in a few pieces, but the assembly is straight forward. it does require a few allen wrenches and sockets and such. just by the grace of Thor did I have the right tools in my very limited tools supply. the bike is a cheap price, but decent construction. you won't find a better bike for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Beware of stationary comfort...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy who has started the process of getting fit and needed to get started, and this was the fifth purchase to get that done. I use it with
customer_reviews.author: M. Horwath

customer_reviews.title: The bike looks great and rides safe and solid.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. I converted it to an electric bike and it rides great!
customer_reviews.author: Leon Walker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bike(s)!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for myself and the Firmstrong Urban Lady Multi-Speed for my wife. We are trying to stay healthy and walking is just too slow and boring for us. These are great bikes and we love to ride them almost every day. The internal gearbox is so much better than the external gears...the change is so smooth and there is no jerking as there is with the external gears. We also love the fact that there aren't cables running everywhere for the brakes. Just good old fashioned coaster brakes. Oh and the tires are huge, which makes the ride so smooth. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Michael and Jennifer Fox

customer_reviews.title: Defective Manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: We bought the bike for my son's birthday. It was exactly what he was wanting. Unfortunately, the bike was defective and unable to be assembled. The front forks were misaligned and we could not get the front wheel on. We had to package all of the parts back up in the box and return it. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Josh M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: Great bike! Easy to put together. Very smooth ride. We have two bikes now at our condo. This 3 speed and one without gears. Both are great bikes but the 3 speed is a much easier ride just using the 2nd speed which I would think would be comparable to the other bike. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: good but, seat can move up and down unless ...
customer_reviews.text: good but, seat can move up and down unless holding nut underneath made very very tight. Not a good design there, as whole seat held by one nut without reinforcement, would give and thus bike useless if sig force put on it, or more like, over time.
customer_reviews.author: LAWRENCE

customer_reviews.title: Factory defect.
customer_reviews.text: Nice in general but the factory did not thread the inside of one arm of the crank so the pedal could not. E attached.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis E. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Easy riding
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike! Sturdy, easy riding and very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: T Cooper

customer_reviews.title: American made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two Firmstrong 3 speed bikes, for my Mom & step Dad. Set them them up with usb rechargeable lights, bells and a basket for Moms bike. We’er all pleased as beans to have’m. A great American made product. 🤙🏽
customer_reviews.author: GBH

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I have about 200 miles through my new bike since I got it last month and it's fantastic! My orange paint is electrifying and the white wall tires have a great, classic feel. If you want a beginner/light exercise bike, give this one a try!
customer_reviews.author: MJA

customer_reviews.title: Verry nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: Checked out bikes on line and this showed had one used bike. I decided to go with the used bike witch add said bike showed like new. When I got the it looked just like new and rides great. I am very happy with hole deal
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is perfect! Originally noticed lots of these cruisers while in San Diego and just had to have one for myself. I'm 6'1" and it fits me nicely with great comfort on somewhat long bike rides. Super easy to put together since it comes mostly pre-assembled, just had to hook up the handle bars, front tires and reflectors.
customer_reviews.author: Brick777

customer_reviews.title: Love the upright position
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy to ride. Love the upright position. The chrome looks very "hipster cool" and gets lots of looks. Buy another color. I have the chrome.
customer_reviews.author: Fun4678

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier. I am 6' 3" and this bike fits me comfortably. I have really enjoyed riding it so far. It allows for an upright position and is easy to control. The oversized wheels absorb bumps and make for a smooth ride. The Seller contacted us several times to ensure we were happy. Very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice bike. Putting it together was fairly easy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bike. Putting it together was fairly easy. It's so much better than the Shwinn I bought a few years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Cauley

customer_reviews.title: This is a super nice bike
customer_reviews.text: This is a super nice bike! I purchased this one, because of the color and it is very cool. In lighter conditions, it looks very brown, in low light conditions, it looks like "boston bake bean." Even with the seat all the way down, it is somewhat tall, so you should be at least 5'6" for this bike. The wheelbase seems short and it is very maneuverable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the bike
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the bike. After adjusting the chain, chain guard, and a few other things, I was able to get a rattle to disappear. Love the look of the bike. I'm 6'4" 230lbs. I'd say if I was going to get another bike, I'd probably go for a stretch cruiser. But this bike is great. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: Bike
customer_reviews.text: Great product; good price; prompt delivery! Very sturdy and perfect for a 250 lb guy. Easy assembly. Cool color. Great bike!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Bicycle arrived with the bearings for the pedal system falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Husband likes it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, went together fairly easy, arrived fast and in good condition. He is happy with it
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and align the gear shifter (I got the 3-speed). A very comfortable and steady ride. Rode all over Cape May, NJ without issues or fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: ScubaSteve

customer_reviews.title: I did not go online to bitch I’m wondering what you can do about it please
customer_reviews.text: We just got the bike about two weeks ago and he’s running it two times now every time he rides it both tires go empty so so far the bike has not been able to work for us
customer_reviews.author: Joe olenwine

customer_reviews.title: Bike biking biker
customer_reviews.text: It's a bike and does bike things. Not to be confused with non bikes or doing non bike things.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: We love these bikes. We just bought this one to have on hand for guests. Well made, comfortable with stock seat and handles. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine durable bike
customer_reviews.text: Really fine durable bike. The three speed shifter is very smooth. It is very comfortable, large seat and high handle bars. I can sit up with good posture. I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Fullstature

customer_reviews.title: Everything was going smooth until now that I needed to ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was going smooth until now that I needed to refill tire's air. Tires air pressure specification states a range of 40-65 PSI (as of printed on the tire itself), one of the tires blew up while pumping at 37 PSI. Very disappointing, now I need to spend more money getting the tire repaired/replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Morcate

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Everything would of been great other than the front flat tire..pretty annoying to have to fix and replace the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Leonel Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bike good shape. Very happy Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the right choice my friends.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike. Everything I'd hope it would be. Went together real easy right out of the box. Pretty much pre-assembled and ready to go. I added some nice chrome fenders and it's been smooth runnings ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Glaser

customer_reviews.title: repaired it already twice - pedals just felt off - ...
customer_reviews.text: repaired it already twice - pedals just felt off - twice. got paid by the seller for the first reparation.
customer_reviews.author: Reto Aeberhardt

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for (or sometimes less!)
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with the quality of this bike. Sure I only spent about $225.00 on this bike, but I could have purchased a bike of similar quality at Walmart for less than $100.00. The wheels are not even trued properly. I would pay a little extra and get a quality product next time.
customer_reviews.author: J Williams

customer_reviews.title: My red bike!!!
customer_reviews.text: My bicycle was packaged and arrived as stated on the website. Totally easy to put together. Great quality. So happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and rides nicely
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted in a basic bicycle. I thought it came well packaged with padding and cardboard for protection in-transit. Looks good and rides nicely. I did have a minor but mentionable problem fitting the handlebar post into the neck - mine was a tight fit even greased up and required some pounding, but I used the shipping material and a padded dumbell to avoid any dings. I haven't assembled a bicycle in decades but this was overall kinda fun and took less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jakubowicz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The bike is crap..recieved with boxed messed up took it to bike shop there telling me it's a cheap bike..its gonna cost just as much to fix as it was to buy it..broken spokes and much more ..I wouldn't buy it..
customer_reviews.author: Nicole McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stylish bike
customer_reviews.text: These are great bikes for the price. I'm a large man and these hold up against my abuse .
customer_reviews.author: S. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Well made fun bike the frame is a mid size 19" to ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made fun bike the frame is a mid size 19" to fit many different heights.It even has a kick stand . the green paint is beautiful Metallica finish
customer_reviews.author: D. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Highly Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Great Bike! Easy to build and seems sturdy enough for a 200lb guy!
customer_reviews.author: aturnbull77

customer_reviews.title: It's fun to ride and cruise through the neighborhood
customer_reviews.text: Construction seems solid. It's fun to ride and cruise through the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Good once we got there
customer_reviews.text: The bike wasn't too hard to assemble, but the pedals were a problem
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Spradley

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly and an awesome finish for the (almost) cinnamon ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid bike, easy assembly and an awesome finish for the (almost) cinnamon red. Comfy seat and handles. Love the bike
customer_reviews.author: SotaBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Miami bike life
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike I also have it in red nice smooth ride
customer_reviews.author: Iveth Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Great bike. Well built
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Well built. Easy to assemble. I purchased one a year ago and recently bought another. My two boys use at college.
customer_reviews.author: creatorofsmiles

customer_reviews.title: Recommended size is off.
customer_reviews.text: Minimum height for the 26" crusier is 5'4" but you better have some long legs if you are that height. The box says your crotch should be above the top bar of frame about 1-3 inches. The inseam of your pants better be at least 32-34 or higher. But in addition to that the frame seems short (front to back). Other brands you get a feeling of riding a Harley but the Firmstrong is different. I am not sure why. Smaller frame? I spent some time adjusting the seat and handle bar but still not quite right. Maybe it will grow on me. Kinda disappointed at the moment but will update if my feeling changes after some time riding it.
customer_reviews.author: The DL

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: This bike is everything I expected and more. I get lots of compliments. Rides smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: KARLA BURGOS

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE BIKES!!!
customer_reviews.text: The two three speeds I bought are an absolute disaster and both fell apart...I have become a very active bicycle repairman The bolt that keeps the crank in the chain-wheel gets loose(usually when your an hour into your ride)
customer_reviews.author: Martin Riess

customer_reviews.title: Very durable.!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bike.! Great quality and very nice to look at. Picks up speed pretty fast. I purchased the 26” single speed chrome bike w/ matching fenders. 100% do not regret my buy what so ever.!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: ... a little while to set it up but we love this bike
customer_reviews.text: Took a little while to set it up but we love this bike. My wife got the Purple female version. We also attached a car set to the back for my son and it worked great! Very comfortable for cruising around the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Zack Brown

product_meta.title: Firmstrong Urban Man Beach Cruiser Bike, Mens Bicycle
feature_bullets: Single speed cruiser bike, great for casual rides around town, by the beach, or throw the neighborhood
19" Frame, 26" Wheels, will fit most adult men 5'5" and above
Classic cruiser frame design with oversized dual spring saddle and balloon tires
Simple pedal backwards coaster brake makes stoping easy, there's no cable to fuss with
Rider sits upright while riding, taking pressure off the back
